title: What should I do in Define Task?
content:
Provide parameters for your text capture task/analysis. Fill the form on this page to define the task.

Task Name: Provide a name for your task/analysis. This name will be used in Task Manager and output folders (Input Folder Name + Task Name = Output Folder Name).

Selected Input Folder: The input folder you selected for this task. Click Select Folder button to select a different folder if needed.

Select Taxon Group:Select a taxon group relevant/related to your input. System will use the resources (e.g., glossary) relevant to your taxon group in this task.

Use Empty Glossary: Use this option only when none of the Taxon Groups is relevant at all to your input files. The system will build a glossary for your taxon group with your input in the process.
